Package android.content.res

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MiuiResources
    This method is used on non-MIUI ROMs only and shouldn't have any negative impact on them.
    MiuiTypedArray
    This method is used on non-MIUI ROMs only and shouldn't have any negative impact on them.
    XModuleResources
    Resources that can be created for an Xposed module.
    XResForwarder
    Instances of this class are possible values for XResources.setReplacement(int, java.lang.Object).
    XResources
    Resources class that allows replacements for selected resources
    XResources.DimensionReplacement
    callback function for XResources.getDimension(int), XResources.getDimensionPixelOffset(int) and XResources.getDimensionPixelSize(int)
    XResources.DrawableLoader
    callback function for XResources.getDrawable(int) and XResources.getDrawableForDensity(int, int)
    XResources.ResourceNames  
    XResources.XTypedArray
    TypedArray replacement that replaces values on-the-fly.
